message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair starting point?
You wanted 60-40, I'll meet you halfway at 75-25. Your turn to decide.
You're getting closer to my end, I'll meet you at 62.5-37.5. Don't expect me to go any lower.
Final offer: 52-48, don't let it slip away!
I'll make it a 60-40 split, but this is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
